info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 3:07PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Sanpete County through 345 PM MDT... At 307 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mount Pleasant, or 7 miles northeast of Moroni, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mount Pleasant, Fairview and Spring City. This includes US Route 89 between mile markers 273 and 289. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
